description:
No prompt message to delete an instance or not, similar to delete an image in glance 

Steps to reproduce:

nova delete instance_id

Expected Result:
Should display a warning message whether to delete an instance or not

Actual Result:

Instance is deleted once the command is executed
title: prompt message for server delete functionality

comments.content:

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~kommuri-siddanth

comments.content: In general, I don't think novaclient should be prompting the user before executing any actions. It's a developer tool not an end user application. Adding prompts could break the way some developers use it (i.e. with scripts).
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~philip-knouff

comments.content: I don't necessarily agree with philip's reasoning, but I do agree that we shouldn't do this. I would rather not break existing clients depending on 'nova delete <id>' not raising a prompt.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon
